headline: Next-Gen Cybersecurity Market Forecast to 2030 with Historical Analysis Since 2020 - Palo Alto Networks, CrowdStrike, and Fortinet Lead the $21+ Billion Industry
summary: Key drivers include increased IoT and cloud adoption, regulatory pressures, and advanced AI tools. Opportunities lie in zero-trust architectures, endpoint protection, and securing remote work environments.Dublin, Oct. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Next-generation Cybersecurity Market - Global Industry Size, Share, Trends, Opportunity, and Forecast, 2020-2030F" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.The Next-generation Cybersecurity Market was valued at USD 21.24 Billion in 2024,
